tool_description:
At homesage.ai, we are pioneering the proptech transformation, delivering advanced AI-driven solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of a broad spectrum of real estate and home improvement professionals, including realtors, contractors, developers, lenders, insurance companies, proptech and fintech platforms. Our APIs offer seamless integration into client websites, providing access to sophisticated analytics, insightful market data, and actionable intelligence.

Our expertise lies in unc...
name: Homesage.ai Property Intel - Elements
title: Homesage.ai Property Intel - Elements

api_list.name: Flip Return
api_list.description: This API provides estimated flip returns for a given property. The user can further refine the calculation based on financing information—input: property address. The return is calculated in cash by default, but you can specify if you want it financed. Then you have three additional optional fields: downpayment, whose default is 20; interest_rate, whose default is 4.5; and loan_term, whose default is 30. By default, we also use the square footage provided with property information. If the sqft is missing or you want to use a different sqft, you can specify the sqft in the optional field sqft.

api_list.name: Renovation Cost
api_list.description: This API provides the renovation cost for a given property. The main input is the property address, with additional adjustable input parameters. By default, we use the square footage provided with property information. If the sqft is missing or you want to use a different sqft, you can specify the sqft in the optional field sqft.

api_list.name: Short Term (AirBnB)  Rental Values
api_list.description: This API provides short-term rental information for a given property. The values are calculated in cash by default, but you can specify if you want it financed. Then you have three additional optional fields: downpayment, whose default is 20; interest_rate, whose default is 4.5; and loan_term, whose default is 30. By default, we also use the square footage provided with property information. If the sqft is missing or you want to use a different sqft, you can specify the sqft in the optional field sqft.

api_list.name: Long Term Rental Values
api_list.description: This API provides long-term rental indicators for a given property. The values are calculated in cash by default, but you can specify if you want it financed. Then you have three additional optional fields: downpayment, whose default is 20; interest_rate, whose default is 4.5; and loan_term, whose default is 30. By default, we also use the square footage provided with property information. If the sqft is missing or you want to use a different sqft, you can specify the sqft in the optional field sqft.

required_parameters.name: property_address
required_parameters.default: 2117 N St NW Apt 1, Washington, DC, 20037

api_list.name: is TLC
api_list.description: This API uses computer vision to detect if a given property needs remodeling.

required_parameters.name: property_address
required_parameters.default: 2117 N St NW Apt 1, Washington, DC, 20037

api_list.name: Home Value Graph
api_list.description: This API provides historical home value data for a given property. By inputting the property's address, users can retrieve a graph showing the home's value over time.

api_list.name: Renovation Return
api_list.description: This API provides an estimated renovation ROI for a given property. Optional parameters can be used to adjust the estimation.. The return is calculated in cash by default, but you can specify if you want it financed. Then you have three additional optional fields: downpayment, whose default is 20; interest_rate, whose default is 4.5; and loan_term, whose default is 30. By default, we also use the square footage provided with property information. If the sqft is missing or you want to use a different sqft, you can specify the sqft in the optional field sqft.

api_list.name: Property Info
api_list.description: This API provides property information for a given home.

api_list.name: Investment Potential
api_list.description: This API provides investment potential for a given property calculated by advanced proprietary algorithms. This information is valuable for investors, homebuyers and real estate professionals who want a quick assessment of a property's equity potential.

api_list.name: PFS
api_list.description: This API provides a score indicating the price flexibility of a given property. This score can assist in increasing the contract-to-offer ratio.
